Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Chipper \Chip"per\, v. i. [Cf. {Cheep}, {Chirp}.] To chirp or chirrup. [Prov. Eng.] --Forby. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Chipper \Chip"per\, a. Lively; cheerful; talkative. [U. S.] [1913 Webster]

chipper adj : having a cheerful, lively, and self-confident air; "looking chipper, like a man...diverted by his own wit"- Frances G. Patton; "life that is gay, brisk, and debonair"- H.M.Reynolds; "walked with a jaunty step"; "a jaunty optimist" [syn: {debonair}, {debonaire}, {jaunty}]
